page.title: 12Why we live here
page.content: Our school did a survey to ask everybody how long they had lived in this area.These are the answers we received.26% of people had lived here all their lives;38% for under 5 years ;18% for under 10 years;7% for under 20 years and 13% for over 20 years.As you see most people have lived here under 5 years.30% of the people live in this area as their work is here;20% chose to live here as this is where they work and it's in the country;20% as it's just in the country;26% have always lived here.The remaining 10% of the population live here for other reasons that we don't know.We children like living here as we have the freedom to wander round where we want and also in the country there aren't any busy roads.Drawbacks of living in the country are that we have to travel for playparks or entertainment.
